vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Exo.1.15
§ Shiphrah = "fair"
one of the two Hebrew midwives who were ordered by Pharaoh to kill all the male children born to the Hebrews but who disobeyed
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
施弗拉 这个陰性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "美麗"
希伯來的接生婆, 拒從法老命令, 保全希伯來男嬰 #出 1:15|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
施弗拉 这个阴性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "美丽"
希伯来的接生婆, 拒从法老命令, 保全希伯来男婴 #出 1:15|
